::The Oblitercons/Nemesis Enforcer/Reptilica/Bloodystrike/Scattershot/Punch::

Hiss yells, Iron Raptor's teeth scratching his face plate as he tries to get 
away. He fires several shots from his gun, all of them hitting the wall 
behind the enraged raptor.

"Stand down, Maximal," Dark One says calmly, sticking his gun through the 
bars on the other side of the room from Iron Raptor, Breakdown doing the 
same. Both aim their weapons at Tavatron. "Or your friend dies."

The Alliance base's interior defences emerge from the ceiling, aiming at Iron 
Raptor as Pyro and Scavanger aim their weapons at her.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Nemesis Enforcer turns his head as the scanners beep, reporting a bot near 
the base. He swears, activating his comm-link.

"Reptilica, you and Bloodystrike get out there and see what that bot's all 
about. While you're at it, see who the Maxi's threw at us."

Nemesis Enforcer smiles, sitting back in his chair and bringing up a visual 
of the outside.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Reptilica nods, he and Bloodystrike running out of the base and heading for 
BrightBlade.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Punch and Scattershot walk into the brig, both pulling out their weapons when 
they see Iron Raptor in a rage.

"Hats!" Scattershot yells, jumping forward and firing at Iron Raptor, not 
realizing that he could hit Hiss, one hand holding DeathStorm's head on his 
own.

Punch stands near the door, gun ready.
